channel.title: Gnarlyscape v4 Server/Client <Stable/Anti-SYI+Lag free>
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/fwhfra.png[/img][/center]
[center]You NEED to run "!Setup!" for the server to work. If you don't run it, the server will get errors on running.[/center]
[b]Gnarlys Batch:[/b] [i]Download my batch file for your servers![/i]
Features:
[ul][li]Makes a full backup of the server[/li] [li]Compiler, Run -- Both of these auto set for your version of JDK[/li] [li]Delete class files[/li] [li]Character deleter.[/li][/ul]
[url=http://gnarlyupload.ulmb.com//files/1/Gnarlys%20Batch.rar][b]Download it now![/b][/url]
All skills are working, so there's lots to do, but when you first start, you should start Training combat, unless your a skiller.
I had 104 players online at once before and that server didn't crash. [s]I lost the picture but someone else might have it, if you do please post it![/s] [b]Thank you happyman pk for finding the picture![/b] [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/do5krs.jpg[/img]
This server is based on Devolution v5, with many many stability updates you can read more about the stability updates below.
Lets talk about the Anti-SYI, as you may think it's just another noob server that says they are lag free, stable, and anti-SYI. But no, your wrong this server Is and tested Anti-SYI, Lag-free, and very stable. Using a new thread and better features to the powerful eventmanager, the hole server now runs on a single thread, while all the players run on a different thread. Using my ConnectionFilter, there will be no SYI/DoS attacking effecting the server at any means. Having a HostList with an array of all the current connections, tracking what Host is online and offline at the time, the server checks if the connection host is already online. And if it is, the socket will be destroyed before anything happens, ex the player being made and the thread being made for the player.
[b]Download [Server][/b] [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/155583297/Gnarlyscape.rar.html][img]http://rapidshare.com/img/bannersmall2.jpg[/img][/url] [i]From RapidShare. (352 KB)[/i]
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=1AZ7IJG5][img]http://i26.tinypic.com/2v3jz2t.jpg[/img][/url] [i]From Megaupload. (344 KB)[/i]
Some features:
[ul][*]Jad - get firecape from him. [*]Magetraining area [*]Barbarian Assault [*]Barrows Minigame [*]Slayer Tower [*]All skills working cept, Agility [*]Walking Npc's [*]Ice Queen Lair [*]King Black Dragon Lair [*]Dark Bow, Godswords [*]Working high alching [*]Perfect ground item pickup [*]Idle logout[/ul]
Stability updates:
[ul][*]Anti-flood - only allow one client to connect at a time from one address. [*]Stop all SYI and other spoof-login attacks. [*]Stop Connection flooding. [*]Added EventManager - All server process now runs on a new thread so the server lag does not effect the players. Also using process() in client.java is now safe and stable, as i fixed the process by not making it a loop in a loop.[/ul]
Player vs. NPC [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/sctb2g.gif[/img]
Player vs. Player [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/1zqscih.gif[/img]
Following [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/w2h89z.gif[/img]
Prayer switching [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/5cbq5g.gif[/img]
SYI/DoS Protection [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/wu4eph.gif[/img]
Clanwars [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/34srupy.png[/img]
More pictures [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/124f2va.png[/img]
Random picture [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/2uiixhw.png[/img] [hr]
[size=34pt][b]GnarlyClient[/b][/size] [i]Gnarlyclient is based off swats first client, the P2P client. With lots of things updated such as items, npcs, gameframe. And some little things in client.[/i]
Main [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/2m81emv.gif[/img]
New NPC Models [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/2nbsf0y.png[/img]
[b]Download [Client][/b] [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/155666195/GnarlyClient.rar.html][img]http://rapidshare.com/img/bannersmall2.jpg[/img][/url] [i]From RapidShare. (352 KB)[/i]
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=0RQLMCSC][img]http://i26.tinypic.com/2v3jz2t.jpg[/img][/url] [i]From Megaupload. (344 KB)[/i]

item.title: Gnarlyscape v4 Server/Client <Stable/Anti-SYI+Lag free>
item.dc:creator: @Gnarly3 Gnarly...
item.description:
@Gnarly3 wrote:

[quote=“Patrickftw, post:138, topic:237642”]It’s nice.

Is it the cam or is combat in general a bit glitchy?

Edit: Also does following “no clip” and does it work with run?

I’m just curious.[/quote]

It’s not hard to make the following run,
isRunning = true;
isRunning2 = true;

And yes the combat is dodian, it’s a bit glitchy, but i’m not about to give you a perfect server, them are the little things that you must fix.

I provided a stable and lag-free server for you to work from

And no i have never no-cliped from following. yet.

And your sig, is wrong.

“Your is as so.”

“You’re” is just like “You are”

Read full topic
